forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. South southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 6 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the clock softly turns past midnight, Downtown San Francisco finds itself wrapped in a blanket of rain and clouds, ushering in a night filled with the soothing patter of falling droplets. With temperatures gently hovering around 52 degrees, the air carries a crispness reminiscent of autumn, yet the minor increase to 54 adds a hint of warmth as the night deepens. The winds whisper from the south-southwest at a modest pace, coaxing the clouds to mingle and dance overhead. In this predawn hour, a 100% chance of precipitation looms, promising only light rains but enough to dampen the streets and your mood if you're unprepared.

When morning breaks, expect the rain to linger as a companion rather than a relentless force. The day may reveal itself partially sunny, with a high barely grazing 58 before modestly easing into the afternoon chill of 54. The southwestern breezes, occasionally gusting up to 18 mph, might stir the fog up from the bay, cloaking nearby landmarks in a thin veil. As you navigate through the city, a light jacket, perhaps one that protects against both the wind and the moisture, will serve you well. As raindrops mingle with dry pavement, Saturday suggests a gentle invitation for leisurely strolls beneath the canopy of muted colors, encouraging exploration of cozy cafés or quiet bookshops. This day tenderly calls for moments of laid-back introspection, where the art of simply watching the world ebb and flow can be as invigorating as any planned adventure.
